ResearchProjectDef.label: dark archite harvesting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that harvests a targets dark archite genes, ripping them from their body, killing them in the process. The harvested genes will be stored in a voidspike and can be reimplanted into another person afterwards.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->gathered tales of corrupted archite genes
subject_gerund->performing a ritual to harvest genes
subject_gerund->ripping genes out of a body
